Sentencas: This paper presents a methodology for the study of a molten carbonate fuel cell co-generation system.
Titulo: Study of fuel cell co-generation systems applied to a dairy industry

Sentencas: This system is applied to a dairy industry of medium size that typically demands 2100 kW of electricity, 8500 kg/h of saturated steam (P = 1.08 MPa) and 2725 kW of cold water production.
Titulo: Study of fuel cell co-generation systems applied to a dairy industry

Sentencas: Depending on the associated recuperation equipment, the co-generation system permits the recovery of waste heat, which can be used for the production of steam, hot and cold water, hot and cold air.
Titulo: Study of fuel cell co-generation systems applied to a dairy industry

Sentencas: In this study, a comparison is made between two configurations of fuel cell co-generation systems (FCCS).
Titulo: Study of fuel cell co-generation systems applied to a dairy industry

Sentencas: The plant performance has been evaluated on the basis of fuel utilisation efficiency and each system component evaluated on the basis of second law efficiency.
Titulo: Study of fuel cell co-generation systems applied to a dairy industry

Sentencas: The energy analysis presented shows a fuel utilisation efficiency of about 87% and exergy analysis shows that the irreversibilities in the combustion chamber of the plant are significant.
Titulo: Study of fuel cell co-generation systems applied to a dairy industry

Sentencas: Further, the payback period estimated for the fuel cell investment between US$ 1000 and US$ 1500/k-W is about 3 and 6 years, respectively.
Titulo: Study of fuel cell co-generation systems applied to a dairy industry
